channel.title: H2O | Your Data Science Mentor - Mohsen Davarynejad

item.title: PySpark - Sparkling Water - Module 0
item.description:
Recap - Installation guide from scratch

This is a recap, a full inhalation guide from WSL on windows to installation of H2O on Spark.

Import to the same folder, rename it to Kafka-to-Delta Streaming Pipeline, and follow the instructions.

Assignment

Import to the same folder and look into the results. Can you explain what is the results you see in table windowed_aggregations?
